column1: #Text=Escaldes-Engordany is a parish ( administrative division ) mainly to the east of Andorra La Vella but with main village of the same name 1.6 km N of the capital of Andorra on the road to La Massana and Ordino .
#Text=By car , take the CG2 direction Pas de la Casa and France and turn north into Ave der Pessebre .
#Text=Route map at ViaMichelin - Andorra La Vella to Escaldes-Engordany .
#Text=Parking is available at Carrer del Prat Gran .
#Text=By bus , with the exception of e ( express ) bus to Sant Julia de Loria , all of the Andorra 's local bus routes ( L1 through L6 ) have stops in Escaldes-Endogrdany .
#Text=International bus line between Toulouse and Andorra la Vella also stops here .
#Text=If you are in Andorra la Vella , simply walk east .
#Text=Once you passed Carrer del Valria , you are in Escaldes-Engordany .
#Text=The entire tourist area can be explored on foot .
#Text=Av. Carlemany is pedestrian street and closed off to traffic from 12:00 to midnight daily .
#Text=The greater part of Escaldes-Engordany stretches towards Spain and the east .
#Text=Some wonderful walks are to be had up the Riu Madriu direction Pics del Pessons , the " lakes " and the Coll de Vall Civera .
#Text=From July to August : daily 10:00 - 13:00 and 15:00-18:00. The rest of the year only at mass hours .
#Text=Romanesque style , dated from 12th century and restored on 20th century .
#Text=It is notable the disproportion between the nave and the 17-m bell tower .
#Text=Modernist style , designed by the architect Josep Puig i Cadafalch .
#Text=It is no possible to visit because it is a home address .
#Text=A hot spa , considered one of the hottest in Europe ( 70ºC ) .
#Text=Museu del Perfum ( Perfume Museum ) , Av. Meritxell .
#Text=Museu Carmen Thyssen of Andorra , Av. Carlemany , 37 , ☏ +376800800 .
#Text=Centre d'Art d'Escaldes-Engordany ( CAEE ) , Av. de les Escoles , 2 , ☏ +376802255 .
#Text=Art gallery which is formerly a cinema .
#Text=It has sculptures by Josep Viladomat , Romanesque models of Andorra buildings and temporary exhibitions .
#Text=First floor is a library with washroom facilities .
#Text=The spa/sauna/swimming complex Caldea is located at the top of the town in the large glass spire structure .
#Text=The cultural landscape of Madriu-Perafita-Claror Valley , which was inscribed in the World heritage list in 2006 , can only be accessed on foot .
#Text=It offers great hiking and climbing possibilities in summer and in winter ski mountaineering or walking with snowshoes is an option .
#Text=One entrance to the valley is a short bus ride or just over an hour walk from the oldest part of Andorra la Vella .
#Text=Take Cami de la Muntanya ( mountain path ) until it crosses a road ( Ctra de la Comella i de la Plana ) which takes about 20min
#Text=At this point you will be in the valley and can continue hiking on the mountain path for hours
#Text=Similar to Andorra la Vella , Av. Carlemany has plenty of brand name fashion , electronics and jewellery .
#Text=It is worth shopping around to find the best deals .
#Text=A large commercial centre with several floors of shops , many of which are clothing and fashion stores .
#Text=There is a food court on the 3rd floor and a supermarket at the basement level .
#Text=The restaurant also has a wall of photos of " who 's who " celebrities , politicians and dignitaries eating at the restaurant .
#Text=A number of restaurant pubs can be found along Av. Carlemany or its side streets .
#Text=A four-star hotel just beside the Av. Carlemany pedestrian street .
#Text=Golden Tulip Hotel , Carrer del Prat Gran , ☏ +376760760 .
#Text=Located adjacent to Av. Carlemany pedestrian street .
#Text=Hotel Spa Termes SERHS Carlemany Andorra ( Hotel Carlemany ) , Av. Carlemany , 4 , ☏ +376870050 , ✉ info.carlemany@serhs.com .
#Text=The stretch of Avinguda Carlemany in Escaldes-Endogrdany that continues west on the same street as Avinguda Meritxell in downtown Andorra la Vella has free public WiFi .
#Text=Andorra la Vella is the obvious choice as it is right beside Escaldes-Engordany .
#Text=You may have cross the Carrer de la Valira street without realizing that it is the boundary between Andorra la Vella and Escaldes-Engordany .
#Text=You can also head to La Massana and Ordino in the north and Encamp , Canillo , Soledu and Pas de la Casa in the east .
